question: Which of the following statements about asexual reproduction is correct?
options: always involves one parent but the offspring are genetically different from the parent
may involve two parents but the offspring is always identical to one parent.
always involves one parent and the offspring are identical to the parent
involves two parents but the offspring is not genetically identical to any of the parents.
answer: always involves one parent and the offspring are identical to the parent
